rule: The output must always consist of only one word, which represents a valid part-of-speech tag from the provided alphabetical list or one of the accepted non-list options, "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The output format complies with the requirement of returning only the tag.
OK
